name: Pinky Game
description:
Hello, 

This is just a really early stages of a single level game for me to test out workflows and learn more about the game development industry using Unity.  I'm responsible for all the assets and the animation. Your comments and thoughts are very valuable to me. If you like to follow me along to see the journey and how miserable it can get sometimes,  here is the page where i try to keep it updated with my progress: https://www.instagram.com/playougames/

The Keyboard keys:  Space  = Jump

A & D = Move

F = Dash

W = Look Up

S = Look Down/Crouch
